intro.title: A Silent Village
intro.text: You arrive at the edge of a village where every lantern is dim. An old woman hands you a single, flickering lantern and asks for help. Do you accept?

choices.label: Accept her request and take the lantern
Decline and continue on your journey

accept.title: The Lantern's Song
accept.text: The lantern hums softly. It points you toward the forest where whispers echo. A narrow path or a wide road lies ahead.

choices.label: Take the wide road around the forest

decline.title: A Missed Chance
decline.text: You leave the village, but the road becomes foggy. Later you hear tales of a hero who returned light to the village. You wonder what would have happened.

choices.label: Press on and seek fortune elsewhere

path.title: Deepwood
path.text: The path becomes a tunnel of trees. You face a riddle-keeping fox who asks: 'What must be broken before it can be used?'

road.title: Safe Road
road.text: The road is long but steady. You find a merchant who offers you a map in exchange for the lantern.

choices.label: Trade the lantern for the map

riddle_answer.title: Passed
riddle_answer.text: The fox smiles and guides you to a clearing where light gathers. You find a pool that reflects the lantern's true purpose — to reveal hidden sorrow and heal it.

choices.label: Use the lantern to heal the old woman's heart
Keep the lantern's power for yourself

riddle_wrong.title: Wrong Answer
riddle_wrong.text: The fox frowns. The forest grows colder and you feel a tug back to the village — choices matter in these woods.

choices.label: Try to force your way deeper

trade.title: Map in Hand
trade.text: The map shows a hidden lantern shrine. The merchant expects light in return. You realize this map may lead to a secret ending.

choices.label: Follow the map to the shrine
Burn the map and keep the lantern's mystery

refuse.title: Steadfast
refuse.text: You refuse. The merchant shrugs and moves on. Keeping the lantern feels heavier now — responsibility grows with light.

feelguilt.title: Return
feelguilt.text: You turn back. The old woman smiles when she sees you — she needed more than light; she needed company.

presson.title: Stranger Paths
presson.text: You press on. Years later you hear the village's lanterns are lit by another — the world is full of choices you never took.

heal.title: Healer's Light
heal.text: Using the lantern you ease the old woman's grief. The village slowly regains its warmth. You are offered a place among them.

keep.title: Power's Weight
keep.text: You keep the power. It grants you luck — but those you left behind remember. Some doors close forever.

turnback.title: A Second Chance
turnback.text: You return to the village, carrying a deeper respect for the lantern and its duties.

choices.label: Use the lantern to heal the old woman's heart

stubborn.title: Lost
stubborn.text: Forcing deeper only leads to getting lost. The lantern dims under strain. You eventually find your way out, humbled.

choices.label: Press on and seek fortune elsewhere

follow_map.title: Shrine of Lanterns
follow_map.text: The shrine thanks you. The lantern is revealed to be one of many — your choice to trade or keep echoes through time.

burn_map.title: Mystery Remains
burn_map.text: You burn the map. Mystery keeps you moving. The lantern's secrets remain yours — forever a traveler.

road_continue.title: Road's Reward
road_continue.text: Continuing the road you meet a troupe of performers. They invite you to join. Life changes shape once again.

comfort.title: Comfort Given
comfort.text: Your company heals her. She reveals she was once the village's lantern keeper and passes a blessing to you.

apologize.title: An Honest Apology
apologize.text: You apologize and leave. You feel lighter, but sometimes wonder if staying would have changed more than you know.

choices.label: Press on and seek fortune elsewhere

accept_home.title: A New Home
accept_home.text: You become the village's new lantern keeper. The ending is warm: community, ritual, and steady light.

decline_home.title: Road Again
decline_home.text: You decline and leave with a gentle blessing. The world waits with many paths.

join.title: Stage Bright
join.text: On stage, you learn stories and bring light — literal and figurative — to towns. Life becomes performance and meaning.

refuse_troupe.title: Solo Road
refuse_troupe.text: You refuse and carry on, your own story unfolding quietly.

end_wander.title: Wandering Life
end_wander.text: You wander the world, lantern swinging. Some nights you wonder about the village — in that wondering you find small joy.

end_lonely.title: Lonely Fortune
end_lonely.text: Wealth follows, but companionship fades. You learn that light without purpose can be a weight.

end_shrine.title: Shrine Keeper
end_shrine.text: You stay to tend the shrine — a sacred duty, a rare honor. The village's light spreads far over seasons.

end_mystery.title: Eternal Mystery
end_mystery.text: The roads remain mysterious. You never fully solve the lantern's origin, and that's part of its charm.

end_home.title: Keeper of Light
end_home.text: This ending is warm: community, ritual, & steady light. You find purpose and home.

end_performer.title: The Performer
end_performer.text: You perform tales for many towns. The lantern becomes a prop and a symbol — your life is stories.
